title: Green Technology
description: The course looks at clean energy and related technologies, including a high-level understanding of the science, policy, and market forces governing innovation. Students will develop an understanding of the renewable energy sector and the market variability of new technology. Non-GPS graduate students may enroll with consent of instructor. Renumbered from IRGN 418. Students may not receive credit for GPEC 418 and IRGN 418.
